definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: capital of pillar (as surrounding, crowning its top ?);—abs. [[כּׂתֶרֶת]] 1Ki 7:16, 1Ki 7:16 + 10 t.; [[הַכּוֹתֶרֶת]] Je 52:22 c.; pl. abs., [[כּׂתָרׂת]] 1Ki 7:16 + 7 t., [[כּׂתָרוֹת]] 2Ch 4:12, 2Ch 4:12, 2Ch 4:13;—capitals of pillars [[יׇכִין]] and [[בּׂעַז]] 1Ki 7:16, 1Ki 7:16, 1Ki 7:16 + 12 t. 1Ki 7 = 2Ch 4:12, 2Ch 4:12, 2Ch 4:13, 2Ki 25:17, 2Ki 25:17, 2Ki 25:17 = Je 52:22, Je 52:22, Je 52:22.
